name: ShowNameTags
warnings: This function can only be used in OnGameModeInit. For other times, see ShowPlayerNameTagForPlayer.
description: Toggle the drawing of nametags, health bars and armor bars above players.

params_body.name: enabled
params_body.description: 0 to disable, 1 to enable (enabled by default).

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
related_fn:
DisableNameTagLOS: Disable nametag Line-Of-Sight checking.
 ShowPlayerNameTagForPlayer: Show or hide a nametag for a certain player.
 ShowPlayerMarkers: Decide if the server should show markers on the radar.
